quotes.text: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
quotes.author: Olivier Messiaen

quotes.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: Becoming a great leader doesn't mean being perfect. it means living with your imperfections.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.text: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or to get all the credit for doing it.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: The cost of leadership is self-interest.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: Not all readers are leaders, but all leaders are readers.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.text: Mind is the creator of everything. You should therefore guide it to create only good.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: Your first and foremost job as a leader is to take charge of your own energy and then help to orchestrate the energy of those around you.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Victims recite problems, leaders provide solutions.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma
